tutorial: How to set up a new Chart

paragraphs.text: The first connection is between a Trading Session and the Time Machine we have been working on. Drag your Time Machine back up to the Network node. This time we want to follow the Testing Trading Tasks hierarchy down until we find the Backtesting Task for our Trading Strategy. For right now, lets stick with the Lightning Strike strategy. Continue down the hierarchy until you find the Backtesting Session. Now take your Time Machine and create a reference to it.
These steps are the same for connecting to a Live Trading Session.  The only difference is following the Production Trading Task hierarchy instead.
